benchmark_details.name: AA VENUE (AA VE Natural Language Understanding Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: AA VENUE is a benchmark for evaluating large language model (LLM) performance on natural language understanding tasks in African American Vernacular English (AA VE) and Standard American English (SAE), addressing dialect-induced performance discrepancies.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark that evaluates LLM performance across dialects, promoting inclusivity and equity in NLP tools.

data.source: Five key tasks from the GLUE and SuperGLUE benchmarks, with translations from SAE to AA VE validated by fluent speakers.
data.annotation: Validated for cultural and linguistic authenticity by fluent AA VE speakers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on translations from SAE to AA VE, compared against established benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance across evaluation criteria.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through direct comparisons with previous benchmarks and assessments from fluent AA VE speakers.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis of performance across different dialects.
targeted_risks.harm: Highlighting inherent biases and performance gaps between SAE and AA VE.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent was obtained from human validators.
